subtasks: Adjusting plant techniques based on growing zone
Starting seeds with heat mat assistance
Covering jars with plastic for germination
Preparing containers (red solo cups, ensuring drainage with slits)
Planting seeds (3 per container, using seed starting mix with vermiculite)
Applying stem-burial technique (removing leaves, burying stems incrementally)
Setting up grow lights and heat mat for germination and plant growth
Monitoring and maintaining humidity (covering with plastic dome)
